attacks.name: Sting
attacks.description: DC 11 Con save or poisoned 1 hour; fail by 5 or more; unconscious 1 hour, until damaged or awakened.

features.title: Languages
features.description: Understands Common and Draconic but can't speak.

features.title: Pact of the Chain
features.description: If dropped to 0 HP, the familiar disappears, leaving behind no physical form. It must obey all commands of the master.

traits.title: Keen Senses
traits.description: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing or smell.

traits.title: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The pseudodragon has advantage saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.title: Limited Telepathy
traits.description: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions and images telepathically with any creature within 100ft. of it that can understand a language.

senses.title: Passive Wisdom (Perception)
senses.description: Blindsight 10 ft; Darkvision 60ft; Adv. on Wis (Perception) checks using hearing/sight/smell
